entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
